Posts.Content: Jan 2, 2014 10:00AM Chantel wrote: I just went through all of this from April to last week.  Bi lateral mastectomy with implants, reconstruction and lipo for fat injections (near implants).  You can message me and I will explain any questions you have- I really needed specific explanations before I had mine and it was hard to get from people.  If you want to PM me, I will answer any questions you have!  But most of all, you can do it!  I was so nervous and scared… I got through it all and NONE of it was as bad as I had imagined.  Blessings to you :)
Posts.Title: What to expect with a mastectomy and immediate reconstruction? beachykeen Chantel

Posts.Content: Apr 7, 2013 02:39PM Chantel wrote: That is what mine was like and it was cancer.  I'm only in my 30's... not to freak you out (because it is probably just a cyst as are common in the breast) but you should have your doctor check it out.  What part of your cycle are you on?  It's common to get lumps a few days before your period.  If that is the time frame you are feeling the lump, I would wait and see if it is gone in a couple weeks... if it is, then no worries.
Posts.Title: No Idea What's Going On Bekah-lyn Bekah-lyn
